Reviews.Title: Daughter loves it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Shopper "Amazon shopper"
Reviews.Content: It works as advertised and my daughter gets so many compliments. I gave it 5 stars because I had a question and the customer service was great! I would purchase this item again.

ProductInfo.Features:
Hello Kitty external battery to charge your phone/tablet
Great for emergency use
Ideal for bloggers on the go, gamers, devoted twitters, ceaseless device users
No more conventional wall outlet needed when you have this cute portable charger on the go.
Compact, stylish, and overall, a great gift for Her
ProductInfo.Name: 3D Hello Kitty Iphone Samsung Chargers 5S 4S S3 Ipad tablet (Portable Universal Chargers) 8000MAH (Light Pink)
